knimeNode.name: LAPMergeSplitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Does the merging and splitting steps of the LAP tracker.

fullDescription.intro: Takes the tracklets and checks if their start or end nodes should be merged with another tracklet. This could be if an object splitted from one frame to the next or if two spots merge into one in the next frame. If splits or merges are found those two tracklets are merged to one.
fullDescription.option: If an edge between two candidate tracklets (end/start) has lower weight than Merge Threshold the tracklets are merged.
If an edge between two candidate tracklets (end/start) has lower weight than Merge Threshold the tracklets are merged.
If result of (Math.exp(-(weight / Sigma )) * 100) between a starting node of a tracklet and an ending node of a tracklet is lower than threshold, this edge will be ignored.
